snippet.title: Blobbton Trailer | Wishlist on Steam now!
snippet.description:
📋 Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2707320/Blobbton/
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/Fp3yR5pdCE
ℹ️ Website: https://www.blobbton.com

Find the right formations and build a skyward city for the eccentric Architect. Blobbton is a casual puzzle game where you complete changing dynamic tasks on a hexagon game board. With its casual yet challenging-to-master approach, players of all skill levels can enjoy quick and peaceful puzzle-solving sessions. Put your pattern recognition skills to the test and reach for the high score!

Blobbton was developed as a passion project by three Finnish individuals eager to explore their creativity through small indie games. We are always open to feedback, so feel free to contact us! We really appreciate it. ❤️

#gaming #games #puzzle #puzzlegame #casualgaming #casualgames #indiegame #indiedev #gamedev #godot #godotengine #madewithgodot
